quote: I am not the potter, nor the potter's wheel, but the potter's clay, does it depend on the value achieved intrinsic as much as the value of the clay as the wheel and master craftsmanship?
quote_letters: I AM NOT THE POTTER NOR THE POTTERS WHEEL BUT THE POTTERS CLAY DOES IT DEPEND ON THE VALUE ACHIEVED INTRINSIC AS MUCH AS THE VALUE OF THE CLAY AS THE WHEEL AND MASTER CRAFTSMANSHIP
